alert.note: Alert for Laclede; Pulaski; Texas; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:54PM CDT until April 15 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Wright County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... South central Pulaski County in central Missouri... Western Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 453 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Niangua to near Hartville to near Seymour, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southwestern Fort Leonard Wood, Mountain Grove, Cabool, Seymour, Mansfield, Dawson, Norwood, Hartville, Duncan, Diggins, Huggins, Plato, Competition, Manes, Bucyrus, Lynchburg, Graff, Grovespring, Success and Roby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
